(If Lunarpine tackles Serpentor before he shoots Shadow Wing, a 
battle would probably ensue between Lunaprine and Serpentor.  
Probably not allowing Serpentor to aid his comrades in the Ark's 
engine room, screwing up crap in there.  

And then the Oblitercons and others would get involved, because the 
battle is happening near the entrance to the Ark, which they're all 
facing)
